pasugiya dinawala ada halunu dharanipatha wasi hethuwen athi wu pas kandu kada watim nisa mahanuwara gothami balika widuhale godanangiliwalata ha prawishta margayata siduwi athi alabhahani hethuwen ema widuhala dina niyamayak nomathiwa wasa dama atha.widyalayiya prawishta margaye kada watimata aasanna paskandak iwath kirima sandaha me wana wita marga sanwardhana adhikariyata danum di thibe.mema pasala dina niyamayak nomathiwa wasa dama athi bawin thama diyaniyange adhyapana katayuthu karagena yamata wenath thawakalika pasalak laba dena lesa demawpiyo illimak karathi..

ohu chithra shilpiyaku wu joshaf warshing nam wiya.indiyanuwaku wuwada ohu jarmanu sambhawayakin yuktha wuweki ohuge muththanuwan mema chithrapataye kamara adhyakshawaraya wiya.siyatath munuburatath aththe ekama namaki.frans ostan samanga indiyawata pamini maha joshaf pasuwa indiyanu kanthawak ha wiwaha wi erata binna basa gaththeya.pasu kalaka hindi sinamawe nama giya kamara shilpiyaku wu joshaf awasan warata ru ganwa thibune pakisha chithrapatayayi.munuburu joshaf pawasu paridden ekala boho indiyanu wicharakayan prem sanyas kerehi etharam prasadayak dakwa thibune natha.

waidyawaraya puwathpathata pawasa thibune pradeshaye siyalu pawul pilibandawa thaman ha mahajana saukhya niladharin wagakiwa yuthu bawin thamanta nodanwa ema pradeshayen pawulak iwath karaganima barapathala thathwayak bawath, thama ee gana nosathutata pathwana bawath ya.

japan prag ithihasaya - wikipidiya japan prag ithihasaya paliyolithika yugaya[sanskaranaya] paliyolithika yugaye bhawitha karana lada gal aayudha paliyolithika yugaya kri.pu.100,000 sita 30,000 athara kalaye pawathini.me kalayedi mulma gal aayudha nipadawunu athara mema yugaya kri.pu.12,000 pamana enam ayis yugaya awasanayedi nimawiya.minpasu metholithika yugaya arambha wiya.mema yugaye aarambhaya lesa kri.pu. 35,000 niwaradi yayi poduwe piliganiyi.kri.pu.11,000 di pamana awasana ayis yugayen pasu japan dupath samuhaya mahadwipayen wenwiya.aadhunika gaweshakayaku karana lada wanchawa helidarawwimen pasu bahutharayak pahath ha madhyama paliyolithika bhumi dadi lesa nawatha pariksha karana ladi.

athyawashya aushadha warga 44 k idiri sathiya thula genwimata saukhya amathyanshaya thiranaya kara thibe.rohal wala pawathina aushadha hingaya pilibanda soya balima sandaha path kala wishesha kamituwe niladharin saha saukhya amathya maithripala sirisena mahatha athara eeye pawathi sakachchawakin pasu mema piyawara gena athi bawa sandahanya.adala kamitu warthawa anuwa idiri desathiya thula thawath aushadha warga 97 k genwimatath eeta amatharawa awashya siyalu aushadha warga masayaka kalayak thula laba dimatath amathyawaraya thiranaya kara atha.
